Name: PHPWord 0.6.1 Beta
Description:
!!! Changelog:

* Fixed Error when adding a JPEG image and opening in office 2007 [url:Issue #1|http://phpword.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=1]
* Fixed Already defined constant {"PHPWORD_BASE_PATH"} [url:Issue #2|http://phpword.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=2]
* Fixed Error when adding images and links to a document [url:Issue #6|http://phpword.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=6]
* Added font style properties "spaceBefore" and "spaceAfter" for PreserveText Objects [url:Issue #3|http://phpword.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=3]

Name: PHPWord 0.6.0 Beta
Description:
!!! Changelog:

* Added support for hyperlinks (inserting and formatting)
* Added support for GD images (created by PHP)
* Added support for Full-Table-Styles
* Added 10 examples
* Added documentation (Developers Guide)

Name: PHPWord 0.6.2-1 Beta
Description:
* +Update Jul 08 2011:+
** *This update only includes bugfixes and some minor changes that won't affect any feature! No features requests are included.*
** Bug Fix for Workitem [url:http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/26]
** Bug Fix for Workitem [url:http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/19]
** Bug Fix for Workitem [url:http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/17]
** Bug Fix for Workitem [url:http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/13]
** Bug Fix for Workitem [url:http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/11]
** Bug Fix for Example _Image.php_



* Added support for watermarks
* Added support for page borders
* Added support for textrun elements (severel texts with different styles in one paragraph without breaks) [url:WorkItem #4|http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/4] / [url:Discussion|http://phpword.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=210852]
* Added really simple template support (search / replace values)
* Edited handling with paragraph styles (paragraph styles are now placed in a own object)
* Fixed error with UPPERCASED image extensions [url:WorkItem #4|http://phpword.codeplex.com/workitem/7]
* Fixed error with space before text  ([url:http://phpword.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=218106])
* Using "Lazy Loading" for performance optimations
